Test Case Name: Verify dropdown menu displays with correct options
Description: Verify that dropdown selection displays Last Month and Custom options
Step Description: 1. Navigate to Reporting Dashboard 2. Locate dropdown menu 3. Click dropdown to expand
Expected Result: Dropdown should display two options: Last Month and Custom

Test Case Name: Verify Last Month is default selection
Description: Verify that Last Month is the default selected value in dropdown
Step Description: 1. Open Reporting Dashboard 2. Check dropdown default value
Expected Result: Dropdown should default to Last Month without user interaction

Test Case Name: Verify date range displays after selection
Description: Verify that date range becomes visible and remains on screen after selection
Step Description: 1. Open Reporting Dashboard 2. Select Last Month 3. Observe date range display 4. Verify it persists
Expected Result: Date range should be visible on screen and not disappear after selection

Test Case Name: Verify custom date range selection up to 3 months
Description: Verify that custom option allows date range selection up to 3 months from current date
Step Description: 1. Click dropdown 2. Select Custom 3. Enter start date 4. Enter end date within 90 days 5. Verify
Expected Result: Custom date range should accept dates up to 90 days apart

Test Case Name: Verify date range visibility persists on page
Description: Verify that selected date range remains visible when navigating or refreshing page
Step Description: 1. Select date range 2. Navigate to different section 3. Return to dashboard 4. Refresh page
Expected Result: Date range should persist and remain visible after navigation and refresh

Test Case Name: Verify tile-based report UI displays all LOBs
Description: Verify that the tile-based UI shows all available Lines of Business LOBs
Step Description: 1. Click Report button 2. Observe tile-based UI layout 3. Count LOB tiles
Expected Result: All available LOBs should display as tiles in the report interface

Test Case Name: Verify LOB tile navigation and selection
Description: Verify that users can click on LOB tiles to navigate to specific reports
Step Description: 1. Navigate to tile-based report UI 2. Click on a specific LOB tile 3. Verify navigation
Expected Result: User should successfully navigate to selected LOB report page

Test Case Name: Verify report generation from tile selection
Description: Verify that clicking on LOB tile generates report with selected date range
Step Description: 1. Select date range 2. Click LOB tile 3. Verify report generates with correct dates
Expected Result: Report should generate successfully with dates from selected range

Test Case Name: Verify custom date range boundary validation 90 days
Description: Verify that custom date range correctly handles 90-day boundary
Step Description: 1. Select Custom 2. Set start date to Jan 1 3. Set end date to Apr 1 91 days 4. Attempt to apply
Expected Result: System should either accept exactly 90 days or show validation for boundary

Test Case Name: Verify dropdown selection persists after page reload
Description: Verify that selected dropdown option persists after page reload
Step Description: 1. Select dropdown option 2. Refresh page 3. Check dropdown value
Expected Result: Selected dropdown value should be maintained after page reload

Test Case Name: Verify date range does not disappear on dropdown change
Description: Verify that date range remains visible when switching between dropdown options
Step Description: 1. Select Last Month 2. Switch to Custom 3. Switch back to Last Month 4. Check visibility
Expected Result: Date range should remain visible and not disappear during option switches

Test Case Name: Verify invalid date range rejection
Description: Verify that invalid date ranges end date before start date are rejected
Step Description: 1. Select Custom 2. Enter end date before start date 3. Attempt to apply
Expected Result: System should reject and display error message for invalid range

Test Case Name: Verify custom date range beyond 3 months rejection
Description: Verify that date ranges exceeding 3 months 90 days are rejected
Step Description: 1. Select Custom 2. Enter date range of 120 days 3. Attempt to apply
Expected Result: System should reject range and show error message

Test Case Name: Verify play button is replaced by tile-based UI
Description: Verify that play button no longer appears and tile-based UI is implemented
Step Description: 1. Open Reporting Dashboard 2. Look for play button 3. Check for tile-based UI
Expected Result: Play button should not be visible; tile-based UI should be displayed instead

Test Case Name: Verify empty date selection error handling
Description: Verify that selecting report without dates shows appropriate error
Step Description: 1. Leave dates empty 2. Click Report button 3. Attempt to select LOB tile
Expected Result: System should show error message prompting date selection

Test Case Name: Verify reversed date range handling
Description: Verify that system handles when user enters end date before start date
Step Description: 1. Select Custom 2. Enter end date 3. Enter start date later date 4. Verify behavior
Expected Result: System should either auto-swap dates or display validation error

Test Case Name: Verify LOB tile selection validation
Description: Verify that selecting LOB tile validates properly before generating report
Step Description: 1. Click LOB tile without selecting dates 2. Observe validation
Expected Result: System should validate date selection before processing LOB tile click

Test Case Name: Verify report generation without date selection
Description: Verify that report cannot be generated if no date range is selected
Step Description: 1. Open Reporting Dashboard 2. Click LOB tile without selecting dates
Expected Result: Report should not generate and error message should appear

Test Case Name: Validate date format MM/DD/YYYY
Description: Verify that date fields accept and validate MM/DD/YYYY format
Step Description: 1. Enter date in MM/DD/YYYY format 2. Verify acceptance
Expected Result: Date should be accepted in MM/DD/YYYY format

Test Case Name: Validate custom date start date field
Description: Verify that start date field validates correctly in custom range
Step Description: 1. Leave start date empty 2. Enter only end date 3. Attempt to apply
Expected Result: System should require start date and show validation error

Test Case Name: Validate custom date end date field
Description: Verify that end date field validates correctly in custom range
Step Description: 1. Enter only start date 2. Leave end date empty 3. Attempt to apply
Expected Result: System should require end date and show validation error

Test Case Name: Validate date range boundary conditions
Description: Verify that boundary dates first/last day of month are handled correctly
Step Description: 1. Select first day of month as start date 2. Select last day of month as end date 3. Apply
Expected Result: Boundary dates should be accepted and processed correctly

Test Case Name: Validate special characters in date field
Description: Verify that special characters in date input are rejected
Step Description: 1. Enter special characters in date field !@#$% 2. Attempt to apply
Expected Result: System should reject and show validation error

Test Case Name: Validate leap year dates
Description: Verify that leap year dates Feb 29 are handled correctly
Step Description: 1. Select Feb 29 in leap year 2. Apply date range
Expected Result: Leap year dates should be accepted and processed correctly

Test Case Name: Validate same start and end dates
Description: Verify that system handles when start and end dates are the same
Step Description: 1. Select same date for start and end 2. Apply range
Expected Result: System should accept single-day range or show appropriate message

Test Case Name: Validate date picker functionality
Description: Verify that calendar date picker works correctly for date selection
Step Description: 1. Click on date field 2. Use calendar picker to select date 3. Verify selection
Expected Result: Calendar picker should allow intuitive date selection

Test Case Name: Validate timezone handling in dates
Description: Verify that dates are handled correctly in different timezones
Step Description: 1. Change system timezone 2. Select date range 3. Verify dates remain consistent
Expected Result: Dates should remain consistent regardless of timezone

Test Case Name: Validate date range persistence in session
Description: Verify that selected date range persists throughout user session
Step Description: 1. Select date range 2. Navigate between pages 3. Check if date range remains
Expected Result: Date range should be maintained throughout the session
